scenes.background: Monica takes a deep breath, clearly feeling the pressure. Bob looks at you expectantly.
scenes.description: 'Okay, I could use some help. What do you suggest we do?'

options.text: We can split the tasks among us to lighten the load. How about that?
options.analysis: You offered a collaborative approach to manage the workload, showing empathy and moderate social skills, though self-regulation and perception scores were balanced.

options.text: Monica, why don't you prioritize the most critical tasks and we'll tackle those first?
options.analysis: You suggested prioritizing tasks, demonstrating good perception and a balanced approach to empathy and social skills. Self-regulation could be stronger.

options.text: Bob, can you take over some of Monica's tasks temporarily?
options.analysis: You directed the request to Bob, which showed good social skills but lower self-regulation and moderate empathy. The approach could have been more balanced.
